record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - September 26, 2007)

[Page: S12187]

speaking.paragraph: If the Republican leader has nothing further, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned until 9 a.m. tomorrow.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:47 p.m., adjourned until Thursday, September 27, 2007, at 9 a.m.
